description: Advanced physics problems with comprehensive step-by-step solutions covering all Grade 11 topics. Master mechanics, thermodynamics, and electromagnetism through rigorous practice.

topics.name: Unit 1: Advanced Kinematics
topics.description: 2D motion, projectile motion, relative velocity, vector analysis, and advanced motion graphs

topics.name: Unit 2: Newton's Laws Applications
topics.description: Complex force problems, tension systems, pulleys, multiple body systems, and advanced friction

topics.name: Unit 3: Energy and Power
topics.description: Work-energy theorem, conservative and non-conservative forces, mechanical energy conservation, and power calculations

topics.name: Unit 4: Momentum and Impulse
topics.description: 2D collisions, center of mass, impulse applications, rocket propulsion, and momentum conservation in complex systems

topics.name: Unit 5: Rotational Motion
topics.description: Angular kinematics, torque, moment of inertia, rotational energy, angular momentum, and rolling motion

topics.name: Unit 6: Fluid Mechanics
topics.description: Pressure, Pascal's principle, buoyancy, Archimedes' principle, fluid dynamics, Bernoulli's equation, and viscosity

topics.name: Unit 7: Thermodynamics
topics.description: Temperature and heat, thermal expansion, heat transfer, specific heat, phase changes, gas laws, and laws of thermodynamics

topics.name: Unit 8: Oscillations and Waves
topics.description: Simple harmonic motion, springs, pendulums, energy in SHM, wave properties, interference, standing waves, and resonance

topics.name: Unit 9: Electricity and Magnetism
topics.description: Electric fields, Coulomb's law, electric potential, capacitors, magnetic fields, electromagnetic induction, and AC circuits

topics.name: Unit 10: Modern Physics Introduction
topics.description: Quantum concepts, photoelectric effect, atomic structure, nuclear physics basics, radioactivity, and special relativity introduction
